quotes.content: We shall never deny a guest even the most ridiculous request.
Here’s that pay check I owe ya, plus a bonus. Well, here’s your pay check anyway.
Get back to work all of you! I’m not running a happy factory here.
A 5 letter word for happiness: M-O-N-E-Y.
If you're wasting time, you're wasting money and that's just sick.
I loved that dollar. I loved it like a brother. Me and that dollar went everywhere together.
MONEY is the ultimate source of joy.
A man works hard all week to keep his pants off all weekend.
It's not always what you say that matters, sometimes it's what you don't say.
I can think of ten good reasons to never let go of a dime, boy.
What doesn't kill you, usually succeeds in the second attempt.
If I don't make any money today I'll surely break out in a rash!
Well, the way I see it, there are three possibilities: One, you stole it; two, you stole it; or three, you stole it!
What is today but yesterday's tomorrow?
I was the head chef on the S.S. Diarrhea.
Hello. I like money.
It's true! I am cheap!
Clothe me if you can, silly landlubbers!
FREE?!? Nobody eats at my restraunt for free!
That's me money walking out the door!
I've never felt such a strange combination of pity and indigestion.
Three dollars down from last month? I GOTTA RUN A TIGHTER SHIP AROUND HERE!
Three cheers for feeling sorry for ourselves!
Ah... the sweet smell of an all day's sucker.
Counting me money. Money sweeter than honey. Money money this, money money that. Profit will make me wallet fat!
There's gonna be some changes around here!
If people keep ordering it, raise the price.
Sorry. Absolutely no refunds!
That's no reason to go ripping people's heads off, boy.
I smell the smelly smell of something that smells smelly.
Either you (a) put the dime in me pants, (b) put the dime in me pants, or (c) put the dime in me pants!
Wash your hands! Clean the floor! Change your underwear! The HEALTH INSPECTOR'S HERE!!!
Wait, don't shoot! Okay, okay, shoot me... just don't take me money!
Debauchery? I've never thought of picking up trash on a highway overpass as wild, but if it's what the kids are into...

Attention all employees! Just giving you a heads-up. I'll be conducting a surprise uniform inspection in one hour. Whoever doesn't pass gets the boot. This boot to be exact. It's very stinky, and you have to wear it all day.
You wouldn't know cool if I locked you in the freezer!
Ah, the fact that their feeble minds are easily manipulated by cheap playgrounds and talentless clowns is no skin off my nose.
Well, if I was a robot, which I'm not, at least I'm well put together, not some rusted-up, steam-driven pile of junk.
It's not the boots, it's the boot-ee. Err... I mean, uh... the person in the boots.
No world means no money. Now go save the world, or you're fired!
